column4: I installed Ubuntu fresh on my little server, but when I first boot it up, it says "I cannot start the X server (your graphical interface).  I tis likely that it is not set up correctly."  I've tried installing twice, with the same result.
Is there something I need to do first to get it to work+
what video card do you have anyhow?
ive had that issue. I just cant remember what fixed it ;p
